from math import *
 
while 1:
 
    n=raw_input()
    
    if(n=="#"):
        break
        
    sum=0
    
    foo=int(n)
    
    if(foo==1):
        print"1"
        continue
        
    if(foo==2):
        print"5"
        continue
        
    if(foo==3):
        print"4"
        continue
        
    if(foo==4):
        print"0"
        continue
        
    else:
        
        for i in range(5, foo+1):
            
                foobar=int(i%10)
                
                temp=int(pow(foobar,4))
                
                sum=sum+temp
                
        sum=sum%10
        
        print(sum)
